mapper.select: select b.* from(select rownum rm,a.* from(select n.user_code, n.notice_actor, n.board_num, n.reply_num, n.notice_type, n.notice_amount, to_char(n.notice_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as notice_date, n.notice_state, a.user_photo, a.user_nickname from moons_notice n, moons_user a where n.user_code=#{user_code} and n.notice_actor=a.user_code order by n.notice_date desc)a)b where rm>#{start} and rm<=#{start}+10
mapper.update: update moons_notice set notice_state=2 where user_code=#{user_code} and notice_date<=sysdate
mapper.select: select count(*) from moons_notice where user_code=#{user_code} and notice_state=1
